headline: Does SOUN's New Partnership Signal a Turning Point for Enterprise AI?
summary: SoundHound's partnership with Bridgepointe aims to speed enterprise AI adoption, lift recurring-revenue platforms and strengthen its go-to-market strategy.

headline: Cambio Raises $18M to Transform Commercial Real Estate Operations with Agentic AI
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, January 22, 2026--Cambio, the AI-native commercial real estate operations platform, today announced its public launch and $18 million in Series A funding. The round was led by Maverick Ventures, with participation from Y Combinator, Adverb Ventures, Peterson Ventures and angel investors including executives from Procore, OpenAI, Anthropic, Vanta, Vercel, ServiceNow, Notion, and Amplitude.

headline: Software sell-off sparked by AI sets stage for potential big year of M&A, investors say
summary: While much of the tech sector has rallied due to the AI boom, software vendors have been laggards on concern that they'll eventually be displaced.

headline: Why 'Cheap' Software Stocks Could Be The Next Big AI Value Trap
summary: Enterprise software stocks are starting to look tempting again, at least on a chart. Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is trading at November 2022 lows and has lost 55% of its value since its February 2024 peak. Salesforce Inc. (NYSE:CRM) sits near May 2024 levels, down about 40% from its January 2025 high. ServiceNow Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is at its lowest since November 2023, off roughly 45% from its January 2025 peak.
